Michael Vick 's Virginia-based lawyer Lawrence Woodward denied reports that his client spent his first night of freedom at a Virginia Beach strip club. It is absolutely, categorically false, Lawrence Woodward said. to have plenty of laughs at Piers Morgan and Simon Cowell 's expense but now they've been replaced with Michael McIntyre and David Hasselhoff . Ant McPartlin admitted BGT had changed without those two big egos to prick. He said: It has changed the mood of the show but, you know, it might be for the better.`` Hoff does a great job but isn't Simon Cowell or Piers Morgan . You miss Simon Cowell because he is the best judge. He has that ability to say what you at home are thinking. Declan Donnelly added:`` For me, it's just great to be able to introduce the guy from Knight Rider every day... to a backing track of the Knight Rider theme tune.''
